title: Oriental Institute Communications
aka: University of Chicago Oriental Institute Communications
additional-note: The earliest issue renewal noted here is for the first renewal record to specifically mention Oriental Institute Communications.  It was filed under Books, not Periodicals.  Before concluding an issue before or after this one is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
